evidence.claim: MyBumpMyBaby states its adherence to privacy guidelines, indicating possible usage of HIPAA-compliant systems.
The company emphasizes secure handling of personal data, hinting at the adoption of secure integration patterns typical in health-tech.
They mention working with healthcare professionals, which suggests possible integration with health records or EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or clearinghouse use cases found on their website.
